messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.
messages.content: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain. Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle income workers. Campaigned hard to keep Scotland strong as part of the UK. Delivered the largest ever increase in the state pension.

messages.title: 3 great reasons to vote for Ewan Hoyle
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will cut income tax for people in Glasgow South by another £400 each year. The Liberal Democrats will change the law so that the state pension always rises higher than earnings or inflation every year. The Liberal Democrats will increase health spending across the UK which means £800m more for Scotland.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain. Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly.
Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle income workers. Cut Income Tax by a further £400 a year for workers.
Campaign hard to keep Scotland strong as part of the UK. Move more powers to Scotland, and rebalance the economy away from London.
Delivered the largest ever increase in the state pension. The Liberal Democrats will change the law so that the state pension always rises higher than earnings or inflation every year.
The Liberal Democrats will increase health spending across the UK which means £800m more for Scotland.

issues.economy: Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly.
issues.governance: Move more powers to Scotland, and rebalance the economy away from London.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats will increase health spending across the UK which means £800m more for Scotland.

endorsements.endorsement: Ewan with former Glasgow Liberal Democrat MSP Robert Brown
